mapper.select: SELECT id,title,answer2,parse from xkb_gaokao_questions LIMIT #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE xkb_gaokao_questions set parse=#{parse} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id,title from xkb_gaokao_questions LIMIT #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE xkb_gaokao_questions set json=#{json},triples=#{triples} WHERE id=#{id}
